June 22, 19$9
Dr. C. Walter Stone, Consultant
New Educational Media
Department of Health, Education and Welfare
Office of Education
Washington 25, D. C.
Dear Walter*
Becker doesn*t say who wrote this letter, Walter, but I thought
it might be of interest to you. Our committee (and I, I suppose)
will have to be the ones to keep McLuhan on the ground.
It is because he is the only man I know who has these insights,
that we undertook this thing, knowing the headaches and possible
heartaches it will mem.
Thought I*d share with you, personally.
Glad to see you again. Hope your Texas trip irons out difficulties
and clears the tracks. Our utmost in respect and affection.
Sincerely,
Harxy J. Skornia
Executive Director
HJStJO
Enclosure
